author: max
name: TheMovieDB
install_msg:
Thanks for installing.
You will need to set your API key before using this cog. See `[p]tmdbset creds`.
<https://github.com/ltzmax/maxcogs/tree/master/lockdown/README.md> for documentation.
## PLEASE NOTE:
This cog is in alpha phase and using Components V2 and is not fully tested or and stable enough for production use. This also require the Components V2 PR from discord.py for this cog to work.
description: Search for informations of movies and TV shows from themoviedb.org.
short: Search for informations of movies and TV shows from themoviedb.org.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
